-- auto-generated definition
create table gym_member
(
    id              varchar(255) not null
        primary key,
    sex             char(10)     null,
    age             int          null,
    height          double       null,
    weight          double       null,
    imgUrl          varchar(255) null,
    gym_member_name varchar(255) null,
    phone           varchar(255) null,
    card_id         varchar(255) null,
    coach_id        int          null,
    locker_id       int          null,
    passwd          varchar(50)  null
)
    comment 'card_id：会员卡id（gym_card中主键，一一对应，即每个会员拥有唯一且不重复的会员卡）coach_id&locker_id：由会员卡等级定义，level1没有私教没有固定储物柜，level2有私教但没有固定储物柜，level3拥有私教以及固定储物柜';

create index card_id
    on gym_member (card_id);

create index coach_id
    on gym_member (coach_id);
